content: renamed at some point to seafarer s watch cap previous christmas at sea renamed this pattern from the original crocheted seaman s hat to crochet seafarer s cap when they redesigned their website in 2012 the pattern is the third one down on the scribd page here s crochetbug13 s video 1 that shows finishing the side seam using slip_stitch and here s crocheters of awesomeness tutorial 2 on making the hat 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=r7zyqdednos&feature=youtu be&list=uugwvbasy4k5dtfzjcvhzwda 2 http //crochetersofawesome blogspot com/2016/11/freebie-friday-crochet-seafarers-cap-by html
